channel.title: Example Tag on Infusion
channel.description: Recent content in Example Tag on Infusion

item.title: Library setup
item.description: By now, you should have followed the Installation instructions. You should have Hugo and Node installed, and a local copy of a forked version of Infusion. You should also have run npm install in the root of that codebase. “Cleaning” the content folder Before you can start documenting patterns, there are a few things still to do in order to get set up. At the moment, your version of Infusion is a facsimile of the original, containing all this documentation content.
